name: Notion To-Do Manager
description: Stay Organized and Productive with this To-Do TemplateA useful template for staying organized and on task, allowing you to prioritize tasks, track progress, and ensure that all important tasks are completed in a timely manner. Clear view of tasks due today - Never miss a deadline again. Clear view of overdue tasks - Stay on top of your to-dos and make sure no tasks are left behind. Stay organized by grouping your tasks - Group your tasks by project, priority, or any other category that works for
features: Clear view of tasks due today - Never miss a deadline again.; Clear view of overdue tasks - Stay on top of your to-dos and make sure no tasks are left behind.; Stay organized by grouping your tasks - Group your tasks by project, priority, or any other category that works for you.; Calendar view of your tasks - Get a birdâ€™s eye view of your to-dos; Ability to jot notes, checklist, upload files for each task - Keep all your important information in each to-do and never lose track of them again.
